psAddCatchDetailsHeading: Add species to your processed product
psAddCatchDetailsSpeciesAutocompleteHint: Enter part of the FAO code or species name for suggestions e.g. Atlantic cod (COD). You must choose from the suggestions provided to avoid invalid documents.
psAddCatchDetailsSpeciesDetailsBestResul: For best results, search for the common English name or the FAO code (if known) as species nicknames are not supported.
psAddCatchDetailsSpeciesDetailsCannotFin: If you cannot find the species and it is not exempt, call
psAddCatchDetailsTableHeader: You have added {{uniqueSpeciesCount}} species and {{uniqueDocumentCount}} documents for
psCatchCertificateHint: Enter the catch certificate reference number, including any hyphens, dashes or other characters. For example, GBR-2024-CC-BEFCD6036.
speciesNameText: Food and Agriculture Organisation (FAO) code or species name
speciesNameHintText: Start typing a species name or FAO code to see suggestions. For example, Atlantic cod or COD.
speciesMinCharsMessage: Type at least 2 characters to search
speciesPromptMessage: Start typing to search for species
ccIssuedInUK: Was the catch certificate issued in the UK?
ccIssuedInUKHint: This is the last document used to bring the product into the UK.
issuingCountryHint: Enter the country that issued the catch certificate
catchCertificateGuidanceTextOne: The UK catch certificate is the official paperwork that allowed the product to enter the UK
psAddCatchCertificateWeightHint: Enter the weight of the product being exported, as shown on the Catch certificate.
psAddCatchWeightsExportWeightBeforeProce: Enter the weight of the product before any processing. Do not include any additional ingredients.
psAddCatchWeightsExportWeightAfterProces: Enter the weight of the product after any processing. Do not include any additional ingredients.
